title: Susana Martinez: Nancy Pelosi Saying We Are On A Good Path At The Border Shows She Is Either Blind Or Just Plain Old Doesn’t Give A Damn
summary:
Susana Martinez, former governor of Mexico, tells Brian Kilmeade that President Biden is either ill-informed or not aware of the crisis at the border.
Martinez says the Biden administration knows about the rape and physical abuse of children that takes place on their long treacherous journey to the border.
Martinez also took issue with Speaker Nancy Pelosi, saying she has never seen an elected official talk out of both sides of their mouth as well as she does and for her to say that we’re on a good path at the border, she’s either blind, not watching the news, not doing her job or just plain old doesn’t give a damn.
paragraphs: Susana Martinez, former governor of Mexico, tells Brian Kilmeade that President Biden is either ill-informed or not aware of the crisis at the border. Martinez says the Biden administration knows about the rape and physical abuse of children that takes place on their long treacherous journey to the border. Martinez also took issue with Speaker Nancy Pelosi, saying she has never seen an elected official talk out of both sides of their mouth as well as she does and for her to say that we’re on a good path at the border, she’s either blind, not watching the news, not doing her job or just plain old doesn’t give a damn.
